programme.title: Rock the Park S04 E18 - Best of Rivers and Waterfalls
programme.desc: From waterfall meditation in Japan to rafting Class V rapids in New River Gorge, Jack and Colton are looking back on waterfalls that challenged them, and rivers that earned their respect.

programme.title: Rock the Park S04 E19 - Best of Conservation
programme.desc: Jack and Colton pitch in to protect the places we all love, and the creatures who live in them. Included: Endangered sea turtles of Padre Island, the bats of Mammoth Cave, and sorting visitor trash in Yellowstone.

programme.title: Rock the Park S04 E20 - Best of the Rockies
programme.desc: Whether they’re cycling up, hiking down, or canyoneering into the Rocky Mountains, Jack and Colton prove there are endless ways to explore the national parks, forests, and monuments of the Rockies.

programme.title: Rock the Park S04 E21 - Northern California
programme.desc: Colton and Jack explore Northern California. Stops include Point Reyes National Seashore, the Golden Gate Bridge, and Alcatraz Island.

programme.title: Rock the Park S04 E22 - Grand Canyon National Park: Rim to Rim
programme.desc: For the 100th episode of Rock the Park, Jack and Colton experience the Grand Canyon in a way less than 1% of visitors do: They’re hiking rim-to-rim.

programme.title: Rock the Park S04 E23 - Denali: Dog Sledding
programme.desc: Sophia Bush joins Jack and Colton as the guys head back to Denali National Park in Alaska. This trip is going to the dogs as the three immerse themselves in all things dog mushing.

programme.title: Rock the Park S04 E24 - Nevada: The Loneliest Road in America
programme.desc: Jack and Colton are traveling the “The Loneliest Road in America” and discovering the natural history of Nevada.

programme.title: Rock the Park S04 E25 - Santa Catalina Island
programme.desc: Colton and Jack explore this island paradise off California’s coast. They check out the island by bike, search for free-roaming bison that inhabit the island and attempt their first solo shore dive.

programme.title: Rock the Park S04 E26 - Superior National Forest
programme.desc: Jack and Colton are back in their home state to experience a true Minnesota winter. Adventures include fat biking, and cross-country skiing to frozen waterfalls.

programme.title: Big Sur

programme.title: Preview for Death Valley & Mono Lake Nature Film
programme.desc: Experience the dramatic beauty of Death Valley, from sunrise over the sand dunes to the colorful formations of Zabriske point. Explore the unique limestone formations known as "tufa towers", the amazing bird life, and relaxing serenity of Mono Lake, an inland sea at the base of the Sierra Mountains. Bonus footage of the geothermal "hot creek" in the Sierras. This is a preview for the 1 hour film available at www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Journey Through Patagonia
programme.desc: Explore the unmatched wilderness of Patagonia in "Journey Through Patagonia". Magnificent peaks, unique wildlife, aerial glacier exploration, and dramatic skies await you in our most spectacular film yet! Run Time 1hour 45 minutes.

programme.title: Preview for Journey Through Pinnacles National Park
programme.desc: Immerse yourself in the rugged beauty of Pinnacles National Park, where towering rock spires, serene trails, and sweeping vistas come to life. Journey Through Pinnacles National Park captures the park’s unique landscapes, from sunlit cliffs to quiet caves and abundant wildlife. Let the peaceful sounds and stunning views transport you to one of California’s hidden natural gems. The full 45 minute film is available to subscribers of www.NatureStream.tv

programme.title: Journey Through Joshua Tree Relaxing Nature Film
programme.desc: Explore a wonderland of unique desert life in "Journey Through Joshua Tree." The Mojave desert of California is home to the unique Joshua Tree forests and sandstone rock formations of Joshua Tree National Park. Enjoy a calming acoustic guitar soundtrack along with the stunning beauty of this desert landscape. Runtime 75 minutes.

programme.title: Prince Harry: A Fathers Betrayal
programme.desc: When Prince Harry lost his mother Diana at just 12 years old, the whole world was in shock. But behind closed doors, the REAL SHOCKER was the secret feud between Harry and Charles over Diana.

programme.title: Halsey: The Road To Motherhood
programme.desc: Living with bipolar disorder, singer Halsey went from suicidal and living on the streets to becoming a Grammy-nominated artist. Now, Halsey opens up about their painful condition, and how AGAINST ALL ODDS they were able to live their dream life of becoming a mother.

programme.title: Janet Jackson Breaks Her Silence

The Fast and Furious franchise would never be the same - and Paul’s daughter, Meadow Walker, was left without a father. So why did Paul leave her with Vin Diesel? And what important lesson on parenting did Paul teach Vin before he passed away?

programme.title: Travis and Kourtney: Better for the Kids
programme.desc: Legendary rock star and Blink-182 member Travis Barkers biggest fear came true when in 2008 he survived the impossible... his plane crashed and caught fire. He was one of the lucky two to survive. After fighting for his life in the hospital, he fell into a suicidal spiral taking his family and children down with him, until he realized an important truth. ﻿﻿Will his new relationship with Kourtney Kardashian survive his dark past and who predicted the plane crash before it even happened?

programme.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger: Rebuilding Family
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger was forced to be tough at an early age. Abused by his father, Arnold tried to bury his painful past by putting all of his energy into bodybuilding. When he started a family with his wife, everything appeared perfect to the outside world... Until Arnold was publicly exposed for cheating on his wife and destroying his family. Why did Arnold cheat? And how far back do the lies go?

programme.title: Naomi Campbell & Nelson Mandella: Defending A Model
programme.desc: Supermodel Naomi Campbell was one of the most in-demand models of her time, but when the violent side of Naomi came out, she faced 7 years in prison! Then... Nelson Mandela stepped in to teach her a powerful lesson. Why did Nelson Mandela defend the world’s most controversial model?

programme.title: Kourtney & Scott: Family Breakdown
programme.desc: It took 10 YEARS of fighting and heartbreaks for ﻿Kourtney Kardashian to FINALLY walk away from her ex, Scott Disick. She then fell MADLY IN LOVE with musician Travis Barker, and that made Scott absurdly JEALOUS! Why did Kourtneys family CONTINUE to be supportive of Scott despite his toxic behavior?

programme.title: Colin Ferrell & Angelina Jolie: From Rebels To Parents

programme.title: Ben Affleck & Jennifer Lopez: Together Again
programme.desc: Prior to getting back with JLo, Ben Afflecks life had been nothing short of TRAGIC... Why was Jennifer Garner completely fed up with him? And how did Ben almost DESTROY his family?

programme.title: Diana & Camilla: A Princess Betrayed

programme.title: Financial Boot Camp
programme.desc: Stocks and bonds, 401(k)s and IRAs - how investment savvy are you? Less than half of Americans have a solid understanding of basic investing terms and concepts. It can be difficult to grow your wealth if you dont know what tools and strategies are available, much less know how to use them to develop a long-term financial plan. From investing basics to retirement plan funding options, Joe Anderson CFP and Alan Clopine, CPA, take you to financial boot camp to help increase your investing IQ.

programme.title: Risks Threaten Retirement. Rewire Your Plans
programme.desc: "Tariffs, inflation, healthcare costs... how do you shift from saving to spending in retirement while managing risks like these? Jamie Hopkins is a CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER professional, an attorney, and best-selling author of Find Your Freedom and Rewirement: Rewiring the Way You Think About Retirement. He returns to the show , today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 525 with Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA to share insights on how to rewire your retirement plans. Plus, how should Fred and Ginger in Huntington Beach, California, pay for repairs on their rental properties? How can Peter Lemonjello manage taxes in his early retirement with 72(t) elections, rental income, and an installment sale? Can Calvin and Susie in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, buy an $800,000 beach house - and should they?"

programme.title: Do Woke Companies Go Broke & LinkedIn is Ruining your Career
programme.desc: If companies that go woke actually do go broke it could be a billion-dollar investment opportunity that all the biggest hedge funds in the world are ignoring. Companies going woke is the trend of their communications, products and advertising materials aligning their brand with progressive or liberal values and ideas. People who have noticed this trend have also noticed that companies perform worse financially after these branding changes. As a brand manager alienating a share of your customer base with advertising materials and tweets that contradict their beliefs is not a good move especially when they are highly invested in the issues. It’s now common to see customer backlash and product boycotts over ideological issues like Anheuser-Bush’s now infamous Bud Light partnership with Dylan Mulvaney. The paid Instagram and TikTok posts from the activist promoting the beer sparked backlash from conservatives who boycotted the brand in protest. In a desperate attempt to win those customers back Anheuser-Busch’s CEO in an earnings call meeting said this… “We will need to continue to clarify the fact that this was one can, one influencer, one post, and not a campaign, and repeat this message for some time”. This attempt to distance themselves from the controversial marketing campaign backfired when progressive customers also started boycotting the product. This was a rare case where a brand was too woke and simultaneously not woke enough, but it did show that customers could be lost from both sides of the political aisle so this video should really be called “do brands that pick sides on divisive issues lose market share” but that doesn’t rhyme so I am sticking with my choice. Since the post was first made Bud Light sales slumped 23 in May compared to sales the year before costing Anheuser-Bush roughly sixty million dollars in just thirty-one days. Bud lost those sales to competitors like Miller Lite, Coors Light and Modelo Especial which overtook Bud Light as Americas best selling beer in the very same month. Custome

Reunions can be exciting, frustrating, exhilarating, nostalgic, one life given over to practicality while another chases lost dreams. Set against the majestic landscape of the desert, three estranged friends and former band mates "celebrate" turning 30, carrying their hopes, unresolved wounds and intertwined romantic baggage, in this hysterically funny and poignant look at lost loves, forgotten dreams and missed opportunity of three young adults in the final stages of giving up their youth.

Way Of Life (Behind the Line)
programme.desc: Join the athletes featured in Teton Gravity Research's 2013 film "Way Of Life" as they push the limits of what is possible on skis and snowboards on some of the world's gnarliest terrain.

programme.title: TGR Tested Bentonville
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew of bikers as they head down to Bentonville, Arkansas to test out a selection of the newest and most exciting mountain bikes on the market.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking the 1000 Islands
programme.desc: The crystal-clear waters of Lake Ontario are home to a spectacular group of islands known as the 1000 Islands – and there’s 1000 good reasons to visit. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores the must-see local paddling spots by sea kayak.

programme.title: Moana Waiwai
programme.desc: This film follows the FreeSwim journey of wahine (woman) Ally Davey as she takes on 70km of open ocean around the stunning Coromandel coastline over three days to bring awareness to the protection of New Zealand’s oceans. It does more than encapsulate stunning vistas and highlight the extraordinary New Zealand environment, but inspires people to be aware of the natural beauty that surrounds them and to protect it before it is too late. It’s an inspirational film, not an activist film.

programme.title: Whistler
programme.desc: Tag along as the TGR crew heads to Whistler, British Columbia to create an insane terrain park. While waiting for bluebird weather the athletes release some of their angst by doing some bungee jumping off a bridge.

programme.title: Disko
programme.desc: Eccentric French skipper Olivier Huin builds his own wooden boat and takes it into some of the most treacherous waters in the world. Skipper Olivier invites 8 crewmates to join him as he attempts to sail North from Virginia (USA) deep into the Arctic circle in search of the legendary Disko Bay.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: Almost Ablaze
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew for a look behind the scenes of Almost Ablaze, TGR's 2014 film. Athletes and crew alike push the limits of what's possible in the world of ski films.

programme.title: Kayak Fishing Lake Erie
programme.desc: Fishing and kayaking is an unbeatable combination, as it allows you to fish in places inaccessible by boat or foot. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he meets up with Baer Fishing Adventures to chase pike and bass from their kayaks in the marshes surrounding Long Point Bay in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County.

programme.title: Deep Water
programme.desc: Deep Water is a captivating exploration of fear, mentorship, and deep water soloing in panoramic Ha Long Bay, Vietnam with psicobloc pioneer Tim Emmett and competition climber Kyra Condie. Watch as Kyra learns from the master, tackles the fear of climbing high above the water, and then succeeds on one of the hardest deep water solos in Vietnam, The Lightning Crack, graded 5.13. Ha Long Bay, Vietnam is a scenic climbing venue with over 3000 limestone formations dotting the ocean bay.

programme.title: The World of Waves
programme.desc: “The World of Waves” is an astonishing look at the ocean and the waves it creates to all the corners of the world. This film is completely shot on 35mm film as well as on the Red and Phantom camera’s. The visuals are nothing short of mind blowing, backed up with a soundtrack that puts you right in the action. This film embraces images that will last in your mind for eternity. Never before have angles and images in the ocean been captured in pure raw form.

programme.title: Casper The Friendly Ghost
programme.desc: Depressed by the antics of the other ghosts, Casper leaves home to make friends. After unintentionally scaring several potential pals, Casper befriends two young children. programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 14
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Los 10 Mejores Videos Nocturnos
programme.desc: Hola y bienvenidos a Los 10 Mejores Videos, donde contamos los diez mejores videos nocturnos más divertidos.

programme.title: Los 10 Mejores Videos Nocturnos
programme.desc: Hola y bienvenidos a Los 10 Mejores Videos, donde contamos los diez mejores videos nocturnos más divertidos.

programme.title: El Top 8
programme.desc: Hola y bienvenido El Top Ocho, donde contamos los ocho videos más divertidos de la semana!

programme.title: El Top 8
programme.desc: Hola y bienvenido El Top Ocho, donde contamos los ocho videos más divertidos de la semana!

programme.title: El Top 8
programme.desc: Hola y bienvenido El Top Ocho, donde contamos los ocho videos más divertidos de la semana!

programme.title: Videos Divertidos
programme.desc: ¡Prepárate para los 10 videos más divertidos de AFV!

programme.title: Videos Divertidos
programme.desc: Episodio 117 - ¡Prepárate para los 10 videos más divertidos de AFV!

programme.title: BOLT-ADE
programme.desc: Peelville is plagued by a lightning-charged beverage that is the latest weapon in the arsenal of an intergalactic megalomaniac.

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: Train Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is in for a calm and peaceful train journey. And then the hilarious pests enter the scene. The trio is having a time of their life; but at the cost of Don and Colonel. Their train journey is a colossal disaster. But, would the rats get away with it?? He he hell no!

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: LetMeFly
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlies
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: Tooth Trouble
programme.desc: Zips got a bad toothache and is too afraid to go to the dentist. The Super Six decide to help by showing her how easy it is; however, their new dentist looks an awful lot like Sneevil who uses laughing gas to make the Smighties powerless. Zip has to face the dentist to rescue her friends.

programme.title: GREASE IS THE WORD
programme.desc: Durian Grey revives the dark art of Chumpling generation while Ralph struggles with feelings of intellectual inadequacy

programme.title: The Start of Me
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: NeverGiveUp
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: HAI RE HIVE!
programme.desc: Chai Raja, right in the middle of the morning rush runs out of sugar and cant make more snacks. He orders Sundar to go get some but Sundar finds that the naughty Basha has stolen the tyres of the bicycle. If Sundar runs on foot, he will be too late and Chai Raja will lose customers. Thats when Sundar spots a beehive and gets a brainwave. Distracting the bees, he grabs the whole honeycomb and hands it over to Chai Raja. The snacks are super tasty , thanks to the honey and Chai Raja is pleased at Sundars quick thinking . Meanwhile the bees return and are mighty mad to find their hive gone. Basha, very generously points to honey paw marks leading to the hotel and the bees zone in on Sundar as the culprit. Basha gleefully points/uncovers Sundar each time he tries to hide.Basha literally becomes the commader of the bee army giving them all sorts of directions. Ultimate mayhem in the shop as Sundar finds out that sweet beginnings can have a very bitter and bee-bitten end.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Check Out Yuk
programme.desc: When Yuk accidentally gets stuck in a book and the book gets checked out of the library, he comes face to face with the dangers of being out in the real world.Will he survive all the twists and turns his journey takes him on? Will he ever make it back to the library in one piece? Will Icky and Yicky have to continue on as a duo? Watch the crazy shenanigans in the episode Yuk Checks Out!

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: Cuppa Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: AAAAAACCCCHAAAAAIIIIIII
programme.desc: Its a terrible day for Sundar who has caught cold and is on sneeze marathon. Customers are getting bothered. Chai Raja warns him, one more sneeze and he will be thrown out. Well, the day turns into a nightmare for Sundar as Basha does every insane thing to make him sneeze. Gradually, the control becomes uncontrollable to an extent that Sundar lets out a massive sneeze blowing of the entire tea stall.

programme.title: Zoonicorns in the Zooniverse
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: MAKEOVER
programme.desc: On the anniversary, Chai Raja wants the interior to be swankier and hires a painter to do his forefathers portrait (looks a lot like him)- only the painter is a free-loader who paints less and swipes snacks more- and he is even shiftier than Basha. Sundar quickly notices the painters nicking habits, but cant convince Chai Raja of the same. Basha, on the other hand finds himself up against someone who is craftier than Sundar. Sundar and Basha in their own ways try to bring the thieving painter to book (while Sundar tries to amp up the portrait as well) and succeed in ousting the crook, though much cant be said of Chai Rajas portrait ... in the end it looks more like Sundars forefather than Chai Rajas.

programme.title: Newspaper
programme.desc: The best news is that Hepi and Briko have figured out some exciting DIYs!

programme.title: THE LILY OF THE EAST:
programme.desc: The Guardians take a welcome break from brainteasers to go fetch pollen from the Lily of the East, which only grows in one faraway cave. Everyone (including Negu) is convinced the flower’s pollen bestows magical powers. After an arduous journey through a bamboo forest and a series of caves, the Guardians reach the lily. But Koto and Amkko (who have been following in disguise) snatch the flower! By distracting the two mutants with riddles, the Guardians regain the precious flower and its pollen, which the Elders wanted…to flavor their tea!

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: Cat Romance
programme.desc: Its a lovely morning suddenly gone berserk as Cat comes charging in to catch Keet. He opens his jaw wide open when he stops…viola …a beautiful white kitten with big dapping eyelashes and eyes as blue as the clear ocean

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: STICKY SITUATION
programme.desc: Having used his Mystic Stick to defeat a giant beaver, Pai loves his weapon more than ever. Spying, Negu gets an idea. The Guardians’ and the Elders’ possessions start to go missing, and they keep being tricked. A mysterious expert declares the culprit to be…Pai’s stick! But just as Xia’s about to burn the stick, it turns into a mutant Stick Insect sent by Negu! The Guardians battle the mutant and defeat it using Pai’s beloved stick.

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: What Goes Up…
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting a party for all of Abra-Dabra and is granting Deedee the honour of inviting everyone to assemble at 12 o’clock sharp. But with Tiggy having prepared all the delectable dishes and only one hour to get them to the venue and Deedee rushing to invite everybody; Deedee decides to use some magic for the timebeing. On sprinkling some of her ‘light as air’ magic powder on the plates and Nino stringing them together as the master knots-man he is, Tiggy is able to walk them over to town-hall like a bunch of balloons. Deedee and Nino get to invite Charlie and the twins just when Boris misfires his new fishing dart gun onto Uncle Charlie causing him to fall out of his hammock. The Doobydoos and Mewmew are playing together by trying to find which group can make the tallest team-tower, just when Deedee and Nino invites them for the party. Back at town-hall Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy create a floating food game, but Tiggy reminds the Mayor that he isn’t good at tying knots. When the guests arrive, Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy usher them in and tell them how to play the game, but discover that all the strings have loosened themselves and are floating high up near the ceiling. Deedee improvises and gets the twins to use their toy dart guns to pull the food-laden plates to themselves. The Doobydoos along with Mewmew make really tall team-towers and pull their jelly plates to themselves with glee. Nino pulls down a plate that happens to be a bowl of custard. Nino gets drenched in custard, but in a very delicious way.

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: The liquorice touch
programme.desc: The twins encounter Liquorice, a girl who turns everything she touches into something sweet. After a moment of enthusiasm they discover that she is not so happy about her talent

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Bicycle Chase
programme.desc: It’s a lovely day . Dunky is busy oiling his old cycle - until Cat comes around snatches the cycle , removes its wheels and rolls it to the top of the house chasing Keet even on the electric cables.

programme.title: Robo-Gummy
programme.desc: Finding himself over-committed to too many things, Gummy orders a few duplicate robots of himself... who winds up in the end causing more trouble than they’re worth!

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: Float Fault
programme.desc: Fred thinks that if Brains’ design is chosen for building the class float in the school parade, she will be more popular. Her design wins, but is too complicated to build, and Fred takes the blame. On parade day, Friday transforms into her design—a working Destroyer that wins “Best Special Effects.’

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: Top Turtle
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: STICKY SITUATION
programme.desc: Having used his Mystic Stick to defeat a giant beaver, Pai loves his weapon more than ever. Spying, Negu gets an idea. The Guardians’ and the Elders’ possessions start to go missing, and they keep being tricked. A mysterious expert declares the culprit to be…Pai’s stick! But just as Xia’s about to burn the stick, it turns into a mutant Stick Insect sent by Negu! The Guardians battle the mutant and defeat it using Pai’s beloved stick.

programme.title: Lost Lamp
programme.desc: Aladdin discovers his mother has sold the lamp for money. He rushes to the lamp sellers stall when Jamillah arrives, causing a mess everywhere. When Aladdin tells her that Genie has been sold she hatches a plan and dresses up as a noble woman with Aladdin as her servant in order to get him back. Whilst she distracts the lamp seller Aladdin tries to find Genie except theres one problem - there are hundreds of lamps! The lamp seller sees through their disguise and banishes them away but they return and manage to get the lamp only to have the Grand Vizier walk away with it. Jamillah tricks him by trading a pocket torch she has from home, getting the lamp back and saving Genie.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: River of Time
programme.desc: An impatient Pancake must wait a WHOLE DAY to bake a cake with Mama but learns different methods of patience in the Zooniverse, where time keeps slowing down. How to manage waiting and delays with a bit of patience and optimism

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: Lend A Helping Stare
programme.desc: Odessa gets into a staring contest with a Stareoffolous and needs to ask for help...but refuses to. You can do it, but sometimes you need to think about what help you need to get to the next step and ask for that help.

programme.title: BORROWED GLOVE
programme.desc: When Xia finds he’s surprisingly bad at archery, he borrows the Glove of the North and becomes a great archer. Negu sends The Archer, a mutant, to challenge Xia to a contest. The stakes? The Glove of the North!

programme.title: Silly Smighty Day
programme.desc: Its Silly Smighty Day and Zap thinks hes just too serious of a Smighty to show his silly side. But all that changes when Sneevil and Biggs transform Smighties into helpless puppies. Now Zap has to put on the act of a lifetime and pretend to be a puppy to stop the Villains.

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm – and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‘good luck’ will protect him.

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: Who Ate it?
programme.desc: There’s one last donut in the house – and 3 hungry donut lovers... each one of them determined that no one (other than them) gets it!

programme.title: I Cant Fall A sleep
programme.desc: Duda is hanging his Smoofy blanket to dry. Its been his good friend since he was a baby and he needs it to sleep every night. A strong wind blows Smoofy to Scots hideout and Scot decides to turn him into his cape. When Duda realizes that his Smoofy is gone, he becomes distraught and cannot fall asleep. The friends go butterfly exploring the next day; However, Dudas exhaustion from a restless night ruins his expedition. After discovering Dudas problem, the friends try to help him fall asleep. Soon, Scot shows up with a sleep-inducing invention, and inadvertently reunites Doubt with his precious Smoofy. But Scot wont give up Smoofy without a fight.

programme.title: Team Awesome
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: La cura del amor
programme.desc: El doctor Ermolov atiende a la hermana de Anastasia y descubre algo inesperado. En una fiesta conoce a Olga, una mujer muy hermosa.

programme.title: La cura del amor
programme.desc: La hermana de Anastasia se siente mucho mejor y está a la espera de los resultados de la revisión médica.

programme.title: Reescribiendo el amor
programme.desc: Ivy es una editora de libros románticos que deberá enseñarle a un escritor de misterio qué es el romance.

programme.title: En nombre del amor
programme.desc: Nastya se enamora de Andréi, pero su amiga lo seduce y se casa con él. Tras un accidente, ella lo deja.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.title: Little Boy Blue 1936
programme.desc: The Big Bad Wolf stalks Little Bo Peep and steals one of her sheep. She enlists Little Boy Blue and a dancing scarecrow to assist her and her mischievous black sheep in rescuing it. Singing, dancing, hilarity and impalement ensue.

programme.title: The Henpecked Rooster 1944

programme.title: Sinbad the Sailor 1935

programme.title: Quack a Doodle Doo 1950
programme.desc: His Mama is the only one who love Baby Huey, an overgrown clumsy ugly duckling. The other Mamas and their broods shun him like the plague and make his little life miserable. But when a ferocious fox attacks the barnyard, Huey comes to the rescue of one and all. Huey is a hero basking in his new-found popularity. First of the series.

programme.title: Aladdin and His Wonderful Lamp- 1939

programme.title: Me Musical Nephews 1942
programme.desc: Popeye's nephews have been practicing their music and are getting good, but it's bedtime. After Popeye puts them to bed, they discover that many of the things in their bedroom can also be used to make music. And they are also blessed with an uncanny ability to appear to sleep every time Popeye comes to check on them

programme.title: The Front Page 1931
programme.desc: A crusading newspaper editor tricks his retiring star reporter into covering one last case.

programme.title: Making a Living 1914
programme.desc: An out-of-work swindler takes a job as a reporter. After witnessing a car go over cliff, he grabs a rival reporter's camera and races to the newspaper office to enter the photo as his own. His rival is delayed when he gets caught in a woman's bedroom by her jealous husband. The swindler follows the distribution of the paper containing his 'scoop' around town where he is once again chased by the rival reporter. Both end up on the cow-catcher of a streetcar

programme.title: Cops 1922
programme.desc: A series of mishaps manages to make a young man get chased by a big city's entire police force

programme.title: The Jack Benny Program 1954: Season 4:Episode 3; How Jack Met Mary
programme.desc: A reporter asks Jack how he found Mary, and Jack remembers himself as a straw-hatted Hollywood boulevardier, twirling a cane, singing "Just a Gigolo " - lured into a May Co. store by a sale on $ 1.99 guaranteed shirts. 22 years later as he's being interviewed, Jack's still wearing the garish shirt. Underwhelmed by Jack's charms, saleswoman Mary Livingstone cracks wise with Jack, while her female co-workers both slice him up and encourage Mary. Episode also features Rochester singing and scat-dancing with The Sportsmen Quartet on "I Get So Lonely."

programme.title: This Is What A Miracle Feels Like
programme.desc: Sometimes, a miracle feels like you’re free, but you’re still running. Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us to look for signs that God is at work when our feelings haven’t caught up to our reality in “This Is What A Miracle Feels Like.”

programme.title: A Steady Hand For A Sudden Blessing
programme.desc: In “A Steady Hand For A Sudden Blessing,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that even when we don’t see God moving, His hand still holds us steadily.

programme.title: Dig Until God Does
programme.desc: It will flow when it’s supposed to. In “Dig Until God Does,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us how to plant seeds of faith in the dry seasons of our lives until God brings the rain.

programme.title: I'm Going Through But I'm Running Over
programme.desc: Don’t lose heart. In “I’m Going Through But I’m Running Over,” Pastor Steven reveals that even though you may face adversity, God is with you — and He’s making a way through.
